name: Party Saboteurs: After Party
description: Party Saboteurs is a local multiplayer espionage party game for up to four players. Each player controls a spy who is trying to blend in an exclusive cocktail party to complete the missions. The catch? At the same time, they are all controlling snipers trying to identify and eliminate each otherâ€™s spies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Storage: 2 GB available space
